Name: Base Station, Windsor Trans, Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Windsor Ambulette Corp. doing business as Windsor Trans. also known as Windsor Ambulette Corp. doing business as Windsor Trans and also known as Windsor Trans for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of  The Bronx.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Windsor Ambulette Corp. doing business as Windsor Trans. also known as Windsor Ambulette Corp. doing business as Windsor Trans and also known as Windsor Trans for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 1580 Bronxdale Avenue in the borough of The Bronx is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#2007
7/14/1999
